47.eng-name: The Book Of Faith and its Signs

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Sa'd that :The Messenger of Allah [SAW] distributed (some spoils of war) and gave to some people but withheld from others. I said: "O Messenger of Allah, you gave to so-and-so and so-and-so, and you withheld from so-and-so, who is a beliver." He said: "Do not say 'a believer,' say 'a Muslim.'" Ibn Shihab (one of the narrators) said: The Bedouins say: "We believe

chapter.ara-name: باب تَأْوِيلِ قَوْلِهِ عَزَّ وَجَلَّ { قَالَتِ الأَعْرَابُ آمَنَّا قُلْ لَمْ تُؤْمِنُوا وَلَكِنْ قُولُوا أَسْلَمْنَا }
chapter.eng-name: Interpreting the Saying of Allah, The Mighty and Sublime: "The Bedouins say: We believe,
